predicate.note: Frames file for 'sponsor' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 29.8.

example.name: active
example.text: So says the Commonwealth Fund, a New York philanthropist that's sponsoring a $1 million project to develop joint masters in business and nursing programs at 10 universities ... .
example.arg: a $1 million project to develop joint masters in business and nursing programs at 10 universities

example.name: passive
example.text: In the 1920s, a young schoolteacher, John T. Scopes, volunteered to be a guinea pig in a test case sponsored *trace* by the American Civil Liberties Union to challenge a ban on the teaching of evolution imposed by the Tennessee Legislature.
